Nick , this is a different code path than the Trim dragging work I've been doing so I think that this is a straight defect in the new RN's drag code. It's probably more closely related to the Resource dragging code that passed the last test(s) (so the basic Dnd code is still sane)...

Just by looking at the trace in the last comment it appears that the bytes that are in the data field aren't interpretable by the FileTransfer. I'd check the 'dragSetData' handling to ensure that it's creating the bytes for the 'data' field correctly.

Should be fixed with the new DND support. I could not reproduce the error.
